Detailed Description

An interface to specialize for UCB1.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

UCB1::UCB1 ( unsigned int  nArms_,
double  c_ 
)

Constructor.

Parameters
nArms_The number of arms of this UCB1.
c_The constant used in the UCB1 formula: I_t(i) = mu_i + c * sqrt(ln(n_t) / n_i)

int UCB1::run ( unsigned int  n)

Draw 'n' arms and return the index of the arm which has been drawn the most.

The initialization draws (1 per arm) are part of 'n', which means that if 'n' < 'nArms', the UCB1 won't be initialized.

If all arms have been discarded during the process, it returns -1 instead.

Parameters
nThe number of draws.
Returns
The index of the arm which has been drawn the most or -1 if all arms have been discarded.
